comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Very formal and stiff but between the expressions and the clothing with the beautifully polished shoes you can make assumptions about the subjects!  When you look at old shots like this you realise that the material clothing was made from was much more difficult to keep than modern fabrics!

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Maybe they were more difficult to keep but they also use to keep a lifetime
